name: Snow Brawlers
description:
NOTE: THIS IS PRE-ALPHA VERSION OF THE GAME. WE WILL KEEP UPDATING AND FIXING BUGS FOR THIS VERSION. YOU CAN ONLY PLAY THE GAME ON WIRED LAN.

Snow Brawlers is a free-for-all 3D snowball fight game! Collect snow, build a stockpile of snowballs in your cooler, and chase your friends!

Be a crazy kid, enter our playground, and fight our of your way to be the most bad-ass snowball fighter among all your friends!

Official website: www.snowbrawlers.com

facebook: Snow Brawlers
